event.description: Short name for the physical event this message was for, usually the same as the donation tracker.

run.description: Object of the run data from nodecg-speedcontrol. If this is not supplied, no run is set. See https://github.com/speedcontrol/nodecg-speedcontrol/blob/dev/types/RunData.d.ts

stream.description: Array of channel(s) that should be opened by the restream viewer tool.

channel.description: The name of the Twitch channel to be opened.

time.description: Time the active run was changed.
